# notify

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of notify is to provide interactive logging within a sequence
of functions chained by pipes (`|>`)

## Installation

You can install the development version of notify like so:

``` r
pak::pkg_install("jofrhwld/notify")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(notify)

mtcars |>
  notify("Using mtcars") |>
  cov() |>
  notify("Got full covariance matrix") |>
  colMeans() |>
  notify("Calculated column means")

# without explicit messages
mtcars |>
  notify() |>
  cov() |>
  notify() |>
  colMeans() |>
  notify()


```
